      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2093</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Assignment 5:hearing and deafness</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anweisung 5:hearing und Taubheit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Affectation 5:hearing et surdité</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atribuição 5:hearing e deafness</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Assegnazione 5:hearing e sordità</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανάθεση 5:hearing και κώφωση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Asignación 5:hearing y sordera</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is an online interactive assignment on the genetics of hearing and deafness for advanced Biology students</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">genetic counseling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pedigree</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">inheritance.hearing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">deafness</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chromosome</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine interaktive Onlineanweisung auf 
der Genetik der Hörfähigkeit und der Taubheit für hochentwickelte 
Biologiekursteilnehmer</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une affectation interactive en ligne sur la
génétique de l'audition et de la surdité pour les étudiants 
avançés de biologie</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma atribuição interativa em linha no 
genetics do hearing e do deafness para estudantes avançados da 
biologia</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un'assegnazione interattiva in linea 
sulla genetica dell'udienza e della sordità per gli allievi avanzati 
di biologia</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια σε απευθείας σύνδεση διαλογική 
ανάθεση στη γενετική της ακρόασης και της κώφωσης για τους 
προηγμένους σπουδαστές της βιολογίας</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una asignación interactiva en línea en 
la genética de la audiencia y de la sordera para los estudiantes 
avanzados de la biología</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">genetisches Raten</string>
          </keyword>
